This is *asterisk* italics

This is _underscore_ italics

This is **asterisk** bold

This is __underscore__ bold

This is ***asterisk*** bold italic

This is ___underscore___ bold italic

This is mixed **_asterisk underscore_** bold italic, or __*underscore asterisk*__ bold italic. What about *__reversed italics-bold__* or _**reversed underscore asterisk**_?

This is **some bold with embedded *italics***.
